text: The Big Noise is 1944 American comedy movie directed by Malcolm St. Clair and starring Stan Laurel, Oliver Hardy, Arthur Space, Doris Merrick, Esther Howard, Veda Ann Borg. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1944 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Malcolm St. Clair
title: The Big Noise
